item.title: 141023SaturdayReact
item.content:encoded:
css units :

  • em - relative to font size of parent element
  • rem - relative to font size of root html element
    Checkout this website to generate a css button :
    https://css3buttongenerator.com/

Bootstrap

  • footer, header , nav ,buttons , forms need to be created for use
  • Is a Framework to the decrease boilerplate code
  • Installation in 3 ways
    • CDN
    • Local download
    • NPM
  • Boilerplate
<!doctype html>
        <html lang="en">

            <head>
                <meta charset="utf-8">
                <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
                <title>Bootstrap demo</title>
                <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"
                    rel="stylesheet"
                    integrity="sha384-T3c6CoIi6uLrA9TneNEoa7RxnatzjcDSCmG1MXxSR1GAsXEV/Dwwykc2MPK8M2HN"
                    crossorigin="anonymous">
                <link rel="stylesheet" href="./styles/style.css">

            </head>

            <body>
                <h1>Hello, world!</h1>
                <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"
                    integrity="sha384-C6RzsynM9kWDrMNeT87bh95OGNyZPhcTNXj1NW7RuBCsyN/o0jlpcV8Qyq46cDfL"
                    crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
            </body>

</html>

  • Bootstrap h1 to h6, colours normal and subtle variants

    <!doctype html>
<html lang="en">

    <head>
        <meta charset="utf-8">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
        <title>Bootstrap demo</title>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"
            rel="stylesheet"
            integrity="sha384-T3c6CoIi6uLrA9TneNEoa7RxnatzjcDSCmG1MXxSR1GAsXEV/Dwwykc2MPK8M2HN"
            crossorigin="anonymous">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="./styles/style.css">
    </head>

    <body>
        <div>

            <h1 class="h1 bg-primary">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic</h1>
            <h2 class="h2 bg-danger">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic</h2>
            <h3 class="h3 bg-info">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic</h3>
            <h4 class="h4 bg-secondary">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic</h4>
            <h5 class="h5 bg-success">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic</h5>
            <h6 class="h6 bg-warning">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic</h6>
            <p class="display-1 bg-success-subtle">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic
            </p>
            <p class="display-2 bg-warning-subtle">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic
            </p>
            <p class="display-3 bg-secondary-subtle">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic
            </p>
            <p class="display-4 bg-primary-subtle">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic
            </p>
            <p class="display-5 bg-danger-subtle">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic
            </p>
            <p class="display-6 bg-info-subtle">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisic</p>
        </div>
        <div>
            <div class="btn">click</div>
        </div>
        <button class="btn btn-primary">Button</button>
        <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"
            integrity="sha384-C6RzsynM9kWDrMNeT87bh95OGNyZPhcTNXj1NW7RuBCsyN/o0jlpcV8Qyq46cDfL"
            crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    </body>

</html>
